name: Cards of Mischief
description:
The first player that joins is the host and does not get to participate. When the game starts, players are assigned random roles, and a select few will become mafia members. 

Mafia objective: Eliminate all innocents

Innocent objective: Execute all mafia members

The peaceful town of Fishcreek turns chaotic when, out of nowhere, an innocent townsperson gets murdered! In a town far away from civilization and law enforcement, the townspeople take it upon themselves to crack this case. 

Made in 6 days for a computer science project. This is why the game isn't very polished and is probably buggy. I don't plan on making any updates in the future. Play at your own discretion. 

Meant to be played with a group of people in real life.
